title: iPhone 13 PTA Tax, Custom Duty in Pakistan March 2024
text: Home  Business  iPhone 13 PTA Tax, Custom Duty in Pakistan March 2024 iPhone 13 PTA tax in March 2024 starts around ninety thousands and goes up to 140 thousands depending on the model of the Apple device. Pakistani authorities requires all citizens bringing mobiles to Pakistan from foreign countries to register their devices by paying PTA tax if they intend to use them for more than 4 months. The tax introduced in recent time makes flagship devices exorbitantly expensive as compared to locally made phones. Other than the huge price, Apple iPhones are known for their top notch build quality, durable design, and seamless software experience. As iPhone 15 is making waves, older models like iPhone 13 continue to be available in market. Apple iPhone 13 was launched in 2021. The phone comes with powerful Apple A15 Bionic chipset with Hexa Core processor, along with Apple GPU 4-core graphics unit for enhanced performance. It is loaded with 6.2-inch Super Retina XDR OLED display, powerful cameras and plethora of features. iPhone 14 Installment Plans in Pakistan 2024   Your source for latest Pakistan, world news.
